channel.title: Censorship on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Censorship on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gamers Are Furious About the Censorship of NSFW Games—and They’re Fighting Back
item.description: As industry groups decry censorship, players are flooding Visa and Mastercard with complaints and sharing the titles of delisted NSFW games to support developers.

item.title: Gamers Are Furious About the Censorship of NSFW Games—and They’re Fighting Back
item.description: As industry groups decry censorship, players are flooding Visa and Mastercard with complaints and sharing the titles of delisted NSFW games to support developers.

item.title: Age Verification Laws Send VPN Use Soaring—and Threaten the Open Internet
item.description: A law requiring UK internet users to verify their age to access adult content has led to a huge surge in VPN downloads—and has experts worried about the future of free expression online.

item.title: Age Verification Laws Send VPN Use Soaring—and Threaten the Open Internet
item.description: A law requiring UK internet users to verify their age to access adult content has led to a huge surge in VPN downloads—and has experts worried about the future of free expression online.

item.title: Paramount Has a $1.5 Billion ‘South Park’ Problem
item.description: The White House says the show is “fourth-rate” after it showed Trump with “tiny” genitals. The controversy comes just as the FCC has greenlit Paramount’s merger with Skydance and promised to end DEI.

item.title: Paramount Has a $1.5 Billion ‘South Park’ Problem
item.description: The White House says the show is “fourth-rate” after it showed Trump with “tiny” genitals. The controversy comes just as the FCC has greenlit Paramount’s merger with Skydance and promised to end DEI.

item.title: Steam and Itch.io Are Pulling ‘Porn’ Games. Critics Say It's a Slippery Slope to More Censorship
item.description: A conservative group is targeting payment processors as “a weapon” to get adult games deindexed in storefronts. Even games that have nothing to do with sex or abuse have been caught in the dragnet.

item.title: Steam and Itch.io Are Pulling ‘Porn’ Games. Critics Say It's a Slippery Slope to More Censorship
item.description: A conservative group is targeting payment processors as “a weapon” to get adult games deindexed in storefronts. Even games that have nothing to do with sex or abuse have been caught in the dragnet.

item.title: Researcher threatens X with lawsuit after falsely linking him to French probe
item.description: Musk’s X refuses to give French cops “real-time data about all user posts."

item.title: ‘Superman’ Kiss Censored in India, Drawing Fire From Fans and Film Community
item.description: James Gunn’s “Superman” has hit a snag in India – not for action, but for its romance. India’s Central Board of Film Certification (CBFC) removed two kiss scenes – most n
